clue1: ^Why does chief set a unique passcode for each day of the week? I can't remember 7 passcodes at once!
clue2: ^I hope management never finds out that most of us write our passcode to the offices wing on sticky notes!
clue3: ^Mark from QA always loses his passcode memo! If he gets caught, they'll investigate all of us!
clue4: ^Today is Wednesday so the lunch food will be good, can't wait for our lunch break to start!
clue5: ^I hate that managers always start their lunch break before us! Shouldn't it be the other way round?
^We're the ones who are keeping this company afloat!
clue6: ^I'm so glad Jen is always kind enough to tell us the code when we lose it!
^With her help the company feels more like a family then when recruiters say that.
